tagline: Have Mountain Lion roar the remaining battery time again
body:
## Timr.
Have Mountain Lion roar the remaining battery time again. ;) Do you remember the "good ol' days"â„¢ when the battery status item could be changed to remaining battery power in percentage or time? Go back in time with Timr and get that feature back!

This project is forked from: [https://github.com/osigge/Battery-Time-Remaining](https://github.com/osigge/Battery-Time-Remaining)

Build the project with Xcode or download the latest release with automatic updates.

If you find an issue or want a new feature integrated please create a new issue and/or contribute.
name: Timr
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
